title: Congratulations to the Skins Story Slam winners!
body:
https://news-a.akamaihd.net/public/images/oce/Community/FanFic/SkinsStorySlam2.jpg

Hail writers, readers and lore lovers!

The [Skins Story Slam](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/GWZ8anEO-skins-story-slam-fanfiction-contest) has officially come to an end, with votes closed and winners decided. Thanks to all those who wrote stories, helped others in the Workshop, or read and voted for finalists—you're all excellent humans/yordles/vastaya!

The winners of the Skins Story Slam are as follows:

1st: [Shadow and Fire](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/N8PzgE3Z-sss-finalist-shadow-and-fire) by zookie
2nd: [Dragon Slayer](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/lP7KfRV3-sss-finalist-dragon-slayer) by Metablue
3rd: [The Moon Rises](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/Xvu6yEw7-sss-finalist-the-moon-rises) by Bahnshii
4th: [Stronger Than Steel](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/2dfGEjQp-sss-finalist-stronger-than-steel) by MeloDD
5th: [TRACE 1: REBIRTH](https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/contest-fan-fiction/2a4xi8a8-sss-finalist-trace-1-rebirth) by DreamlessDays

Each winner has been contacted via email, and have been allocated one of the following prizes:

1st: 8,000 RP + 1 x Dragonslayer skin of zookie's choice + Shadow and Fire story featured in the client
2nd: 6,000 RP + Dragon Slayer story featured in the client
3rd: 4,000 RP + The Moon Rises story featured in the client
4th: 2,500 RP
5th: 1,500 RP

Congratulations to all the winners! The rest of y'all keep writing now, y'hear?

-The Hanshmear

replies.body: Thanks so much to everyone who voted for my story! It's such an honor to win a contest like this and I'm quite shocked that I actually won it so thank you to everyone who had faith in my story. Congrats to the other winners as well and the rest of the shortlist. All your stories were absolutely amazing and I loved reading them. Keep up the great work everyone ~
Your story totally deserved to win. It was so beautiful and poetic, and very striking! Congratulations!
